title: Yume ga Sameru made (Before You Wake Up)
synopsis: One night, university student Souta meets a girl he has never met before. Yuki, who claims to have been saved by Souta in the past, seems to know nothing about outside world, from shopping to holding a fork. There is also something curious about her. She is extremely afraid of getting her skin touched. The curious life of the strange girl changes little by little.
staff: [['loundraw', ['Director', ' Script', ' Key Animation', ' In-Between Animation', ' Original Creator', ' Character Design', ' Background Art']], ['BUMP OF CHICKEN', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
